title: Project Manager – Creative Production
job_overview:
Part-Time (with full time possibility)| Remote (UK time preferred)

We’re Yogrt Media, and we make ads that don’t look like ads. We’re a fast-growing creative agency crafting scroll-stopping content for ambitious brands — and we need someone to keep the engine running smoothly.

We’re looking for an organized, proactive Project Manager to own timelines, keep everyone aligned, and make sure nothing falls through the cracks. You’ll work closely with our creatives, strategists, editors, and clients to deliver great work, on time and on point.

What you’ll do
Run the show: keep projects moving from onboarding ? strategy ? production ? post-production ? delivery.
Own the schedule: manage deadlines, track progress, and unblock the team.
Be the bridge: coordinate between clients and the team on deliverables & approvals.
Keep us sharp: make sure SOPs are followed and help improve them as we grow.
Support: help onboard and coordinate freelancers, interns, and contractors.
Spot issues early and keep everything (and everyone) aligned.

What you bring
- Experience managing creative, production, or marketing projects (agency or studio experience is a must).
- Excellent communication, organizational, and problem-solving skills.
- Confident using tools like Notion, Slack, Upgrade to see actual info, etc. : Especially with Notion.
- Calm under pressure and able to juggle multiple projects.
- A collaborative, no-drama attitude.

Why Yogrt?
We’re not a boring agency. We make cool, creative work that actually performs, and have fun doing it. You’ll join a tight-knit, talented team where you can take real ownership and grow with us.
